--- title: USA - Carson McCullers subtitle: "A Rock. A Tree. A Cloud." order: 190 --- ## Carson McCullers ![](CarsonMcCullers.jpeg) ### Story We will read McCullers' astonishing story, ***A Rock. A Tree. A Cloud.*** [PDF](Carson McCullers_A_Tree _ A Rock _ A Cloud.pdf) ### Themes - What we might call weirdness in some people...wrongly!! - How to Know someone has Figured it All Out - How to Live - Bad Places and Bad Habits and Bad People...etc. ## Notes and References ### Songs for the Story !! {{< youtube V0tA8CjKlLM >}}
And sadly, [Renowned country singer Toby Keith dies at 62 after battle with stomach cancer.](https://edition.cnn.com/2024/02/06/entertainment/toby-keith-death/index.html) And so, maybe this one... {{< youtube DjCVBPhrH3E >}}
### Additional Readings 1. *The Arrested Development of Carson McCullers*. . “A writer lives differently from people who don’t write.” Of course. 2. "Pretend it's a Seed, OK?" ## Writing Prompts 1. "So long as you learn, it doesn't matter who you learn from, does it?" ( Quote from ["To Sir, With Love"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/To_Sir,_with_Love)) 1. On being scolded for being in Bad Company 1. Life Lessons from Graffiti? 1. On seeing Artists and Designers everywhere...(bah!) 1. A Strange Transformational Hobby... 1. On being a Gig Worker
